entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
